project.html:
isiaurbino.net

with Zero Dot Zero

The project is a result of about 6 months of dedicated collaboration with Zero Dot Zero as a continuation to our previous project in the field of #experimentalpublishing and #digitalpublishing. This platform uses Google Drive and Google Calendar as CMS; users produce, edit and upload their content using GDoc, GSpreadsheets, GCal and/or any other file formats in Gdrive, whereupon the software processes and exposes the content publicly via two APIs #Restful & #GraphQl).

Accreditation:

ISIA Urbino Identity: ZeroDotZero

Software Architecture & Development: Amir Houieh

Concept & Design: Maaike Besseling, Thomas Castro, Michiel Terpelle

Identity Implementation: Maloe Brinkman, Thomas Castro, Jurrit van der Ploeg

Coordination: Wietske Flederus, Floor Weijs
